summary: 该插件用于检测WebLogic服务器是否存在CVE-2022-21371目录遍历漏洞，通过发送特定请求并分析响应内容来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the WebLogic server has the CVE-2022-21371 directory traversal vulnerability by sending specific requests and analyzing the response content to confirm the existence of the vulnerability.
